content: CF-AS CJP all-season fireblock foam Helps reduce the spread of flames and smoke in residential type V-B and commercial non-rated construction ### Categories: Home > Products > Construction chemicals > Foams- - - ### FEATURES:Features All-season fireblock foam Extended temperature range – for use in all seasons Type V-B residential fireblock (ICC ES ESR 2179) Does not contribute to the spread of flames or smoke as per UL 723 with an index of 0 on both. Helps to form an air- and water-resistant seal Applications Restricting air, sound, dirt and water infiltration Insulating and fireblocking in non-fire-rated wood frame walls Concrete formwork Metal decking seams Blank openings For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Foam Yield (up to): 1.6 ft³ Approx. tack free time (at 74°F / 50% rel. humidity): 12 min Approx. cut time (at 23°C / 50% rel. Humidity): 25 min Technical Data | Foam Yield (up to) | 1.6 ft³ | Approx. tack free time (at 74°F / 50% rel. humidity) | 12 min | Approx. cut time (at 23°C / 50% rel. Humidity) | 25 min | Color | Orange | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 194 °F | Application temperature range | 32 - 95 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2005479 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - Package Size 1 pc - 3486072 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 1 case - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 3492770 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 1 case + 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 1x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 1x Cleaner CFR-1 - 3486213 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 3 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 3486215 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 3 cases + 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 1x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3486216 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 6 cases + 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 72x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 1x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3702268 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 9 cases + 1 long disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 108x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 1x Extra long foam dispenser CF DS-L - 3486217 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 9 cases + 2 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 108x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 2x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3486218 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 16 cases + 2 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 192x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 2x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3542182 - CF-AS CJP Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 468x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 3549631 - CF-AS CJP Pallet (39 Cases + 2 Long Dispensers) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 468x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 2x Extra long foam dispenser CF DS-L - 3549632 - CF-AS CJP Pallet (39 Cases + 4 Dispensers) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 468x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP - 4x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3486214 - Insulating foam CF-AS CJP 32 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 384x Insulating foam CF-AS CJP
